org.biojava.utils.math

Class BinarySearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biojava.utils.math.BinarySearch

  • public class BinarySearch
extends Object
    solves y = f(x) = 0 by binary search. Only really suitable for monotonic functions as the method will check that the initial values lie on opposite sides of the X=0 axis.
    Author:
    David Huen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BinarySearch()

    • Method Detail

      • solve

        public static double solve(double min,
           double max,
           double tolerance,
           ComputeObject obj)
                    throws BioException
        method that will attempt solving the equation.
        Parameters:
        min - lower bound of search space.
        max - upper bound of search space.
        tolerance - change in x required to continue iteration.
        obj - the class of ComputeObject class representing the equation to be solved.
        Throws:
        BioException
